name: RPG Time: The Legend of Wright
name_original: RPG Time: The Legend of Wright
description: School’s out! Meet us in an empty classroom for a grand adventure with a young aspiring game developer and his very own RPG. You’re sure to be dazzled by his hand-drawn creations as you journey into the surprising and magical world of imagination! Forget about homework!
developers: 株式会社デスクワークス
publishers: 株式会社アニプレックス
